channel.title: I wanna make sig's for people
channel.description:
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/6786exe626.png[/img]
If you want a signature made for you, Post this [code] Name you want in the sig: Secondary text: (optional) Picture(render): Color: Background: (You don't got to choose, I can make one) Specific Size?: (optional) [/code] I know there is other topics like this, but I don't care xD This comes straight from my Rs2Gods post.. You could just ask me there if you want. [center][b]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ The Signatures I've already made ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b][/center]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/2053ModGrim-sig.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/1566exe626.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/9107Melissa T-sig.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/232DUB-sig.gif[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/7379Halo-sig.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/5735GoW-sig.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/7350Zammy-sig.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/5480pk3r-kyle-sig.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/1985ModGrim-sig.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/2591Melissa T.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/5058Melissa T.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/674dub.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/8402dub.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/145Spursy.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/136Tiger.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/542Melissa T.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/7210Sora-sig.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/288Halo-sig.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/8854m3.png[/img]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/4628Chris.png[/img]
[center][b]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- I can make Desktops too.. lol --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b][/center]
[img]http://123pichosting.com/images/4022ChrisDesktop.png[/img]
I'm rather proud of this one :) [img]http://123pichosting.com/images/3769Zammy-sig.png[/img]
[center][b]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Hope you enjoy ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b][/center]

item.title: I wanna make sig's for people
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:23, topic:60412”]You are so shit at graphics!!! This graphics board needs to be deleted its full of twats that use paint shop pro and think they are amazing!
[center] Can you please refrain from flaming - there is no need for such rudeness.

If the graphics forum should be removed because of the inexperience of people posting in it, I believe the removal of moparscape forums should follow, no?[/center][/quote]

Yes… that would be splendid thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: I wanna make sig's for people

item.title: I wanna make sig's for people
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:21, topic:60412”][quote author=frost21 link=topic=87028.msg935210#msg935210 date=1172290620]
Can you make me a kick ass Wallpaper?(Really needing a better one than my current windows one…)No rush though,slow - best i love th sig you made… for me xD

Name you want in the sig: Blank,
Secondary text: (optional) none
Picture(render): Zero or Subzero or Scorpion(whichever render is best)
Color: Bluish with black - subzero, reddish black - zero or reddish black - scorpion.
Background:
Specific Size?: Desktop size.
[/quote]
For yours, I’m gonna have to ask your desktop size.[/quote]

Oh sorry, uh 1024 x 768 pixels

Read full topic

item.title: I wanna make sig's for people
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“usernamelol, post:8, topic:60412”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=87028.msg923662#msg923662 date=1172037874]
Thanks man that rocks… could you change it to say Dave <3 susie

<3 can be a picture heart maybe, or just keep it at <3

LOL i just realised how spotty my face is and how curly my hair is… thats not usual lol.
[/quote]
Why were you in the bathroom…?[/quote]
her room basically has an en suite bathroom… so its non un-common for us to be in there, plus were both totally vein so we like to mess around with make up alot (yeah you’d be surprised she’s my girlfriend) and thats the reason she has ALOT of make up on also because we were messing around, she doesnt usually use that much.
Anyways you didnt ask for my life story so baiii

Read full topic
